title: Tree Diagrams with Coins
body: This tree diagram shows the tossing of an unfair coin followed by drawing one bead from a cup containing three red (R), four yellow (Y), and five blue (B) beads. For the coin, $$P(H)=\frac{2}{3}$$, $$P(T)=\frac{1}{3}$$ where H is heads and T is tails.\n##figure1.gif
